text: Ogoh ʙoş, ki inho muşrikon dar zamiri xud kufrro pinhon medorand. Gumon mekunand, ki on cī dar zamiri xud nigoh medorand ʙar Alloh pūşida memonad. Ojo namedonand, hangome ki az rūi çaholataşon çomahoi xud dar sar mekaşand, Alloh medonad on ciro pinhon medorand va on ciro oşkor mekunand. Pinhon va oşkoraşon nazdi Alloh ʙaroʙar ast. Caro ki Ū donoi rozi dilhost
